productVision: Web analytics platform for SaaS companies to track user behavior, retention, and revenue metrics. MVP focused on core tracking and dashboard features to validate product-market fit. Goal: Launch to first 10 beta customers in 8 weeks.

backlogItems.title: JavaScript Tracking SDK
backlogItems.userStory: As a customer, I want to add a simple tracking script to my app, so that I can start collecting user events
acceptanceCriteria: Manually track custom events via API

backlogItems.title: Event Collection and Storage
backlogItems.userStory: As a platform, I want to reliably collect and store millions of events, so that customers can analyze their data
acceptanceCriteria: REST API endpoint for event ingestion
Store events in time-series database (ClickHouse or TimescaleDB)
Handle high throughput (10k events/sec per customer)

backlogItems.title: Real-Time Analytics Dashboard
backlogItems.userStory: As a customer, I want to see live user activity and key metrics, so that I can monitor my product usage
acceptanceCriteria: Key metrics: active users, events/min, top events
Filter by event type and properties

backlogItems.title: User Segmentation
backlogItems.userStory: As a customer, I want to segment users by properties and behavior, so that I can analyze specific user cohorts
acceptanceCriteria: Create segments based on user properties
Create segments based on events performed
Common segments pre-defined (new users, power users, etc.)

backlogItems.title: Retention Analysis
backlogItems.userStory: As a customer, I want to analyze user retention over time, so that I can measure product stickiness
acceptanceCriteria: Define retention event (e.g., login, core action)

backlogItems.title: Funnel Analysis
backlogItems.userStory: As a customer, I want to create conversion funnels, so that I can identify drop-off points in user journeys

backlogItems.title: Customer Onboarding and Account Setup
backlogItems.userStory: As a new customer, I want to quickly set up my account and start tracking, so that I can see value immediately
acceptanceCriteria: Display installation instructions with API key
Verify tracking is working (check first event)

backlogItems.title: Team Collaboration
backlogItems.userStory: As a customer, I want to invite team members to view dashboards, so that we can collaborate on analysis

backlogItems.title: Billing and Subscription Management
backlogItems.userStory: As a customer, I want to upgrade to paid plan, so that I can access higher event volume limits

backlogItems.title: Email Reports
backlogItems.userStory: As a customer, I want to receive weekly summary emails, so that I stay informed without logging in daily
